name: Sideshow
description:
Buy you self a car and drive over the Hightway, chose your  way and make the Street to the Racetrack .

Start your Career with an old car and Drive like a slug, gain Money and  get some new features on your car, like a big boost or police Sirenes.  

Gain more money buy better Cars and drive faster and with Higher risk.

Drive at Day, Night and even in the Rain! One way, Two way or with time attack! But dont crusch into someone!

Drive in a Bus keep it over 80 km/h and reduce the Damage or the Bus  will explode and everyone dies!

The other drivers on the track give a F..k about you on the Road they keep driving on the street like in a Sunday Drive!

Have Fun Enyoy and tell your Friends!
